summary: The Prison Staff Safety Enhancement Act aims to address sexual harassment and sexual assault of Bureau of Prisons staff. It mandates the Inspector General to conduct a comprehensive review and analysis of the incidence and effects of such acts, including analysis of existing punishments. The Inspector General is then required to submit a report to the Attorney General and relevant congressional committees. Finally, the Attorney General must promulgate a rule establishing national standards for the prevention, reduction, and punishment of these offenses.
